title: Haier 256 L Frost Free Double Door Bottom Mount 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (DAZZLE STEEL, HEB-25TDS)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Warranty Card, Ice Tray, Key, Egg Tray
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features, 3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty is Not Valid in Case of the Following Events: If the Product has been Installed, Serviced, Repaired, Opened or Tampered by Any Unauthorized Personnel or Technician. If Defects Arise or Caused by Accidents, Alteration, Misuse, Neglect, Substitution of Original Components with Spurious or Non-genuine Components, Attacked by Household Pest or Rodents, Flood, Earthquake, Lightning or Any Other Act of God or Natural Calamities. The Product is Shifted Outside India. Warranty does not Cover Plastic, Glassware and Bulb

product_description.Aesthetic Design: This fridge features a sleek and classy design that will complement your kitchen decor.
product_description.8-in-1 Convertible: Its 8-in-1 convertible design will help you store and organise your food items as per your requirement.

review:
Using since 3 months.. Very good product. Value for money.. Good for family of 3-4 members. Bottom freezer refrigerators helps a lot when you use less of deep freezer in your day to day routine & more of normal freezer.. This usually helps for older people where they need not always bend down to look what's there inside fridge .. And even the 8 modes of controlling the cooling conditions inside the fridge helps a lot...Installation and response from Haier team is good and quick.. Thanks to flipkart for on time delivery! 5 stars for everything!
Note : Review is not given for commercial purpose.. Consider this as genuine review ! Thanks!

Very much happy with my purchase. It has enough space for a family of 4-5. The bottom mount design is really innovative and helps the elderly from not bending much. I trust Haier and hope it stays with us for years.. 😀🤞

GOOD FRIDGE IN BUDGET !!
Average build quality
Feels like old fridge design
Low glass quality
Buttons should be out side
Overall best for its price
Fast cooling
Convertible awesome

Excellent refrigerator, great value for money

+ Great ergonomics thanks to the bottom mounted freezer
+ The convertible aspect is very useful. Converted the freezer to a fridge, and turned off the fridge section for vacation and it worked really well.
+ Fridge section temperature is maintained very well. Even when hot objects are placed in fridge they are cooled very quickly.
+ Big bottle section on door is quite useful for bigger juice bottles and cartons.
+ Has wheels at the rear making it easy to tilt and move

- 3 Star Energy rating
- Liquids in fridge section (usually milk) freezes on cold nights (when the room/ambient temperature drops to around 10-12ºC)

We have been using this refrigerator for past 2 months now. I think this is spacious enough for a four member family. Power consumption considerably reduced after this purchase. The delivery and installation service was appreciable. I don't know a lot about the technical side of this refrigerator. But we really loved this purchase. My mom don't have to bend down to take vegetables. She's really happy about that. For elderly people, this bottom mount refrigerator will be a perfect choice...
READ MORE

The Value for money.....
256L is best for the 4-6 members... Bottom freezer is best option for who having back pain to take vegetables or essentials . Updated technology for the current period..
The Convertible option is 💯 8-1
& Compartment and division of the each and place is nicely done....
Safely delivered to home and next day the Haier executive contact me to get the Fitting and Fix the refrigerator time... They where ready to take any time schedule....
The Guy opened and gave instructions to how to utilizes the refrigerator efficiently...
Service was 💯❤️ both FK @ Haier

The product was delivered on time, delivery guys are always hesitant for a open box delivery, but I want to see the product, had a bad experience with the delivery guys, but the installation from haier is really friendly and scheduled an appointment came on time, very professional and explained each feature clearly multiple time to my father since he takes time to understand things better, my father was totally satisfied with engineer happy to see my father happy... The best ever deal this season...Happy celebrations. Team Flipkart...

This refrigerator is great! I got it for my new house. It's quiet. I love the space for food and other items. I also like that you can adjust the shelves from freezer to refrigerator to door (very convenient). This refrigerator is very well built. I am extremely happy with it.
Good Product in this Price
Value for money, worth full product.

There is some heating issue on the both the side walls during the first use of the refrigerator which is common as said by haier executive. Hope that it works fine in the future days to come. I will update the review after one month of usage. Thanks to flipkart and haier for quick response..
